original_text: Take ye the spoil of silver, take the spoil of gold: for there is none end of the store and glory out of all the pleasant furniture.
korean_text: 은을 노략하라 금을 노략하라 그 저축한 것이 무한하고 아름다운 기구가 풍부함이니라

sentences.original_text: Take ye the spoil of silver
for there is none end of store
and glory out of all the pleasant furniture
